Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2009 06:58PM wise1 wrote: We don't know where you live and what, if any, major medical centers are nearby.  But, if I were you, I'd consult another doc for a second opinion.  Admittedly, I don't know everything (haven't had my own surgery yet), but I'd want this done in a hospital and not the doc's office.
